name: They're (not) bugs!
description:
>> PLEASE NOTE << When playing on browser, parts of the UI won't show as intended unless the game is set to full screen. Please use the blue full screen button at the bottom right or download the PC version. 
A small clarification about controls: The "dot" in the hand symbolizes your mouse, use it to aim when grabbing the ants.

"They're (not) bugs" is a game about a man who's trying to save his pets from his beloved grandson. Help the ants survive a variety of dangers and enjoy the short story within!

> Instructions:
Use the play button at the top of the page  or download the file and open the "They're (not) bugs.exe" file to start the game. 

> Controls:
A mouse will suffice. Further instructions given in-game. If you're stuck on the menu, mind the ant in the container at the bottom of the screen, grab it and start your journey ;)
ESC to exit the game. 

> Software used:
- Unity
- Krita

The game has been developed in a weekend for the BackTrace GameJam 3

Thanks for playing and any feedback is welcome!
